entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, referred to by Voldemort and described as crouching behind a headstone.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, referred to as drawing nearer to Harry.

entities.name: harry's father
entities.description: Mentioned by Harry as an example of someone who died upright and trying to defend themselves.

relationships.description: Voldemort is drawing nearer to Harry, indicating a confrontation between the two.
Harry is afraid of Voldemort and knows that he will die if he stays crouched behind the headstone.
Harry draws inspiration from his father, who died upright and trying to defend himself, and decides to do the same.
